headline: Does Fortinet's (FTNT) Cautious Guidance Reveal Shifting Enterprise Security Priorities?
summary: Fortinet recently delivered a presentation at Fal.Con 2025 in Las Vegas, amid heightened attention following disappointing second-quarter results and weaker revenue guidance. Analyst downgrades and legal inquiries have since emerged, highlighting concerns about growth, the pace of firewall refresh cycles, and shifting enterprise cybersecurity spending. We'll examine how Fortinet's weaker revenue outlook and cautious tone could reshape its investment narrative and long-term growth...
